entries.title: Bankman-Fried agrees to extradition from Bahamas to face U.S. charges
entries.description: Former CEO of failed crypto exchange FTX is accused of orchestrating a massive, years-long financial fraud.

entries.title: NASA says wind could power human missions on Mars
entries.description: Wind turbines could power human missions on Mars and open up parts of the planet once considered untouchable

entries.title: The key moments that define Elon Musk’s time leading Twitter
entries.description: Elon Musk's time leading Twitter has been marked with major changes, from layoffs to new rules.

entries.title: ‘Fortnite’ maker Epic to pay $520 million to settle child privacy case
entries.description: “We accepted this agreement because we want Epic to be at the forefront of consumer protection and provide the best experience for our players,” the game maker said in a statement.

entries.title: Last-minute gift guide: Online presents that are actually good
entries.description: Our favorite online gifts that show you actually care, from niche streaming memberships to online improve classes.

entries.title: Scrutiny mounts over tech investments from Kremlin-connected expatriates
entries.description: Before moving abroad and backing high-tech companies in the United States and allied nations, several of the expatriates were affiliated with one or more of three high-profile Russian tech initiatives.

entries.title: Elon Musk’s future as Twitter CEO uncertain as poll is set to close
entries.description: Musk apologized and launched a poll on whether to remain Twitter CEO after a policy outlawing promotion of other social media sites prompted major backlash.
